title: What happend to league.... low elo..
body:
Hi, im getting a little tired of the same old games after games... currently bronze 2 wich sucks.. but determind to get out i play alot, be friendly, and play a carrying roll jungle.

My best friend and i play alittle game, in wich we determind who will get reported who will leave and who is gonna says im raping ur mom 100x in 1 game..

i am really getting sick of these things riot. i play a game where im 20/8 helped every lane getting fed but at they end get reported for nothing but only because they fckup there part of the game.. 

Why is finding good teammates of atleast friendly ones in solo or douq so hard..
what happend to league of legends in wich it dindt mater if u got killed in the first 5 min and people say aahh np we got this..
nooo now it is wtf reported noob ff..

this game is such a fun one playing with friends or decent teammates butt those are rare..

i think we as a communitie gotta do something about this. iknow i am not they only one!..

sorry for the typos english is not my language.
